subject: Baseball
Radio
Audio Recordings and Downloads
lead_paragraph: A rare audio recording of the Mets’ first game captured the voice of Howard Cosell, still emerging as a broadcaster, as host of the team’s pre- and postgame show.
snippet: A rare audio recording of the Mets’ first game captured the voice of Howard Cosell, still emerging as a broadcaster, as host of the team’s pre- and postgame show.
